useCase.name: Enter Subject Responses
useCase.trigger: MRI Operator accesses the digital form to enter subject responses

mainSequence.step: MRI Operator accesses the digital form
Digital Form Interface displays the form
Digital Form Interface posts responses to Subject Responses API
Subject Responses API saves responses in Neurohub Database
Subject Responses API confirms the saved responses
Subject Responses API confirms success to Digital Form Interface
Digital Form Interface displays success message to MRI Operator
